extendedInfo.description: Compare two images and spot the differences between them. Play in Spot the difference game, you can improve your concentration and perceptiveness.How to play:- find the 4 differences between images- use max three hints / tips- you get points for: finish each stage, each discovered difference, saving hints and timeScore as many points and become champion Spot the difference. Save your score on the highscore list and share it with your friends on Google+ or Facebook.If you like this application share this on Examobile profile:Google https://plus.google.com/s/examobileorFacebook https://pl-pl.facebook.com/ExaMobileHave fun !!!
